abstract: Disney earnings beat analyst forecasts by a wide margin.
snippet: Disney earnings beat analyst forecasts by a wide margin.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES – Profit soared 40 percent at the Walt Disney Company in its most recent quarter, propelled by three blockbuster movies, strong merchandise sales and deferred revenue at ESPN.

headline.main: Disney Earnings Are Better Than Expected

abstract: Profit soared 40 percent in its most recent quarter because of a trio of blockbuster movies, strong merchandise sales and deferred revenue at ESPN.
snippet: Profit soared 40 percent in its most recent quarter because of a trio of blockbuster movies, strong merchandise sales and deferred revenue at ESPN.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Profit soared nearly 40 percent at the Walt Disney Company in its most recent quarter, propelled by three blockbuster movies, strong merchandise sales and growth at ESPN.

headline.main: Disney Earnings Are Better Than Expected
headline.print_headline: 3 Hit Movies Help Drive Disney Profit 40% Higher
